Belgium: Sigebert I inherits the Frankish kingdom of Austrasia.
France: Chlothar I died. The kingdom was divided among his four sons; Paris went to Charibert I, Burgundy to Guntram, Austrasia to Sigebert I, Soissons to Chilperic I.
Germany:
Chram was captured and executed.
Chlothar died of pneumonia.  His kingdom was divided among his surviving sons Charibert I, Guntram, Sigebert I and Chilperic I.
